text: Taylor Swift MIA : 7 Legit ( ish ) Theories To Explain Where The Popstar Has Disappeared To WHERE IS SHE?! We ’ ve got a real quick question for you : Where the F is Taylor Swift at the moment? We ’ re used to seeing her all over Instagram with her girl gang, or leaving the gym looking sweaty yet stylish ( shout out to that time she used a £££££ Celine handbag as her gym bag ). But recently, our favourite pop princess has been a little MIA, so we thought it was about time that we figured out where on earth she is. Or, at least, speculate and put together some outlandish theories - basically the same thing right? So, here it goes.
